00040             function                set_up()
00041             {
00042                   $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00043                   $this->CacheSwitch = $Settings->get_package_setting( 
00044                         'cache' , 'last' , 'cf_cache' , 'cache_switch' , 'off'
00045                   );
00046                   $Settings->set_package_setting( 'cache' , 'last' , 'cf_cache' , 'cache_switch' , 'on' );

00059             function                tear_down()
00060             {
00061                   $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00062                   $Settings->set_package_setting( 'cache' , 'last' , 'cf_cache' , 'cache_switch' , $this->CacheSwitch );
00063                   
00064                   $Cache = get_package_object( 'cache' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00065                   $Cache->drop_cache();
00066             }

00168                         {
